divs: sighting detailsi was looking up at the sky while smoking a cigarette and when i turned around to go back in, i seen a light in the sky going over my house. it made no sound and had no wings\rotor blades and was just a bright light. i then grabbed my camera and shot 20 seconds of it b4 it went behind the trees. i estimate it to have been 1000 + feet up. it moved rather slow as it went over. when i first noticed it, the light was coming from the front of my house (west\northwest) going over towards my backyard (south\southeast). if you view the video frame by frame and look at frame 95 as well as 96, there is something there. that part is something i wish i could get another view on.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around November 13th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It was a white light with no sound
